title: Her Stepbrother's Baby
description: Young, naïve Melanie Jacobs succumbed to a single night of passion with her stepbrother Christian Evans, a gorgeous billionaire. After Melanie rejected his desire to start a relationship, Christian moved on and is now engaged to the world-famous supermodel, Lucia. To Melanie’s shock that single passionate night has yielded lasting consequences – she is expecting Christian’s baby. She’s determined to make the best of her situation, and stay out of Christian’s life – but will she be able to keep her secret? Find out in … Her Stepbrother’s Baby.
author: Taryn James
